selectedVerses.text: The waters closed in over me to take my life; the deep surrounded me; weeds were wrapped about my head
let thorns grow instead of wheat, and foul weeds instead of barley."The words of Job are ended.
Let both grow together until the harvest, and at harvest time I will tell the reapers, Gather the weeds first and bind them in bundles to be burned, but gather the wheat into my barn.'"
But he said, 'No, lest in gathering the weeds you root up the wheat along with them.
Just as the weeds are gathered and burned with fire, so will it be at the close of the age.
